lead_paragraph: An anticipated matchup of the erstwhile Atlanta aces, Tom Glavine and Greg Maddux, did not materialize Thursday night when Dodgers Manager Grady Little decided to start Hong Chih Kuo over Maddux.
snippet: An anticipated matchup of the erstwhile Atlanta aces, Tom Glavine and Greg Maddux, did not materialize Thursday night when Dodgers Manager Grady Little decided to start Hong Chih Kuo over Maddux.
